	Beg	Bribe	Threat	Creed	Fame required	Reputation required	Rep ok, 1st greet	Rep ok, 2nd greet	Beg return	Bribe return	Threat return	Fame too low	Rep notorious, I'm good	Rep notorious, I'm evil	Rep saintly, I'm good	Rep Saintly, I'm evil	Rep below zero, 1st greet	Rep above 10, 1st greet (and I'm evil)	You aren't good enough for me. (1st time)	You aren't bad enough for me.	Rep below zero, 2nd greet	Rep above 10, 2nd greet (and I'm evil)	You still aren't good enough for me (2nd time)	You still aren't bad enough for me (2nd time)	I accept your beg	I don't like begging	Thanks for the bribe	I don't like bribes	I accept your threat	I don't like threats
